Rulings.Base: 1. Removing 1 Normal Trap Card from play is not a cost. The effect of "Diskblade Rider" targets 1 Normal Trap Card in your GY.

PSCT.Edison: ① Once per turn: You can target 1 Normal Trap Card in your GY; banish that target, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK until the end of your opponent's turn.
